title: 2 found dead in Lawrence after apparent murder-suicide, DA says
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News The 32-year-old man and 30-year-old woman were in a long-term dating relationship, the DA said.

title: Pedestrian struck and killed in New Bedford, the city’s second fatal pedestrian crash in 2 days
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News The recent pedestrian deaths have prompted New Bedford police to begin an “enhanced” roadway safety initiative.
